articles.title: GefÃ¼hle auf RumÃ¤nisch ausdrÃ¼cken â€“ Emotionen in deiner Beziehung teilen
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

# GefÃ¼hle auf RumÃ¤nisch ausdrÃ¼cken â€“ Emotionen in deiner Beziehung teilen

In einer Beziehung ist es wichtig, Ã¼ber GefÃ¼hle sprechen zu kÃ¶nnen. Wenn dein Partner RumÃ¤nisch spricht, wird er es besonders schÃ¤tzen, wenn du deine Emotionen in seiner Sprache ausdrÃ¼cken kannst. Diese Phrasen helfen dir dabei, eine tiefere Verbindung aufzubauen.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="I love you"
  translation="Ich liebe dich"
  pronunciation="ai lav juu"
  context="Eine der wichtigsten Phrasen, um Zuneigung auszudrÃ¼cken"
/>

## Positive GefÃ¼hle ausdrÃ¼cken

### Liebe und Zuneigung

<VocabCard
  word="I love you so much"
  translation="Ich liebe dich"
  pronunciation="ai lav juu sou matsch"
  example="I love you so much, darling."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="I'm in love with you"
  translation="Ich bin verliebt in dich"
  pronunciation="aim in lav with juu"
  example="I'm completely in love with you."
/>

| RumÃ¤nisch | Deutsch | Aussprache |
|-------------|---------|------------|
| You mean everything to me | Du bedeutest mir viel | juu mien EV-ri-thing tu mii |
| I need you | Ich brauche dich | ai nied juu |
| You make me happy | Du machst mich glÃ¼cklich | juu meik mii HÃ„P-pie |

### GlÃ¼ck und Freude

<VocabCard
  word="I'm happy"
  translation="Ich bin glÃ¼cklich"
  pronunciation="aim HÃ„P-pie"
  example="I'm so happy when I'm with you."
/>

| RumÃ¤nisch | Deutsch |
|-------------|---------|
| I'm delighted | Ich freue mich |
| This makes me glad | Das macht mich froh |
| I'm so glad to have you | Ich bin so froh, dich zu haben |
| You make me the happiest | Du machst mich zum glÃ¼cklichsten Menschen |

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡´" title="Kultureller Kontext">
Expressing emotions openly shows trust and deepens your relationship. Don't be afraid to share your feelings.
</CultureTip>

## Schwierige GefÃ¼hle teilen

Es ist auch wichtig, Ã¼ber schwierige GefÃ¼hle sprechen zu kÃ¶nnen:

### Traurigkeit und Sorgen

| RumÃ¤nisch | Deutsch |
|-------------|---------|
| I'm sad | Ich bin traurig |
| I'm worried | Ich mache mir Sorgen |
| I feel lonely | Ich fÃ¼hle mich einsam |
| I'm disappointed | Ich bin enttÃ¤uscht |

<VocabCard
  word="I need your support"
  translation="Ich brauche deine UnterstÃ¼tzung"
  pronunciation="ai nied jor suh-PORT"
  example="I need your support right now."
/>

### Stress und Ãœberforderung

| RumÃ¤nisch | Deutsch |
|-------------|---------|
| I'm stressed | Ich bin gestresst |
| I'm exhausted | Ich bin erschÃ¶pft |
| I need a break | Ich brauche eine Pause |
| I feel overwhelmed | Ich fÃ¼hle mich Ã¼berfordert |

## Fragen nach GefÃ¼hlen

So fragst du deinen Partner nach seinen GefÃ¼hlen:

<VocabCard
  word="How are you?"
  translation="Wie geht es dir?"
  pronunciation="hau ar juu?"
  example="How are you feeling today?"
/>

| RumÃ¤nisch | Deutsch |
|-------------|---------|
| How do you feel? | Wie fÃ¼hlst du dich? |
| Is everything okay? | Ist alles in Ordnung? |
| What's on your mind? | Was hast du auf dem Herzen? |

## UnterstÃ¼tzung anbieten

Wenn dein Partner durch eine schwere Zeit geht:

| RumÃ¤nisch | Deutsch |
|-------------|---------|
| I'm here for you | Ich bin fÃ¼r dich da |
| You can talk to me | Du kannst mit mir reden |
| I'll support you | Ich werde dich unterstÃ¼tzen |
| We'll get through this together | Wir schaffen das zusammen |

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡´" title="Tipp fÃ¼r Paare">
Nimm dir regelmÃ¤ÃŸig Zeit, um mit deinem Partner Ã¼ber GefÃ¼hle zu sprechen. In seiner Muttersprache fÃ¼hlt er sich dabei mÃ¶glicherweise wohler und kann sich besser ausdrÃ¼cken.
</CultureTip>

## Verwandte Artikel

- [RumÃ¤nische Kosenamen](/de/blog/romanian-pet-names-terms-of-endearment)
- [Romantische Phrasen auf RumÃ¤nisch](/de/blog/romanian-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion)

articles.title: Expresii Ã®n UcraineanÄƒ pentru Reconciliere È™i ÃmpÄƒcare Ã®n Cuplu
articles.content:
Ucrainenii aduc Ã®n reconciliere aceeaÈ™i cÄƒldurÄƒ È™i loialitate care le caracterizeazÄƒ relaÈ›iile. DacÄƒ partenerul tÄƒu vorbeÈ™te ucraineanÄƒ, a È™ti cum sÄƒ-È›i exprimi regretul È™i sÄƒ reconstruieÈ™ti legÄƒtura Ã®n limba lui poate transforma un conflict Ã®ntr-o oportunitate de a vÄƒ apropia.

## Reconcilierea Ã®n Cultura UcraineanÄƒ

Ãn Ucraina, familia È™i relaÈ›iile sunt valori fundamentale. Ucrainenii sunt cunoscuÈ›i pentru rezilienÈ›a lor - È™i asta se aplicÄƒ È™i la relaÈ›ii. Un conflict nu este sfÃ¢rÈ™itul, ci un obstacol de depÄƒÈ™it Ã®mpreunÄƒ. Reconcilierea sincerÄƒ poate Ã®ntÄƒri legÄƒtura.

## Expresii pentru Cererea Scuzelor

### Scuze Sincere

**"Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ– Ğ·Ğ° Ñ‚Ğµ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ñ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²/ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°."** (Vybach meni za te, shcho ya skazav/skazala.)
*IartÄƒ-mÄƒ pentru ce am spus.*

**"Ğ¯ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ²ÑÑ/Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ. Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡."** (Ya pomylyvsya/pomylylasya. Vybach.)
*Am greÈ™it. IartÄƒ-mÄƒ.*

**"Ğ¯ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½ĞµĞ½/Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±ÑƒĞ²/Ğ±ÑƒĞ»Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ³ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸."** (Ya ne povynen/povynna buv/bula tak reahuvaty.)
*N-ar fi trebuit sÄƒ reacÈ›ionez aÈ™a.*

**"ĞœĞµĞ½Ñ– Ğ´ÑƒĞ¶Ğµ ÑˆĞºĞ¾Ğ´Ğ°, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ñ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ²/Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°."** (Meni duzhe shkoda, shcho ya tebe obrazyv/obrazyla.)
*Ãmi pare foarte rÄƒu cÄƒ te-am rÄƒnit.*

### Exprimarea Regretului

**"ĞœĞµĞ½Ñ– Ğ´ÑƒĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· Ñ‚Ğµ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑ."** (Meni duzhe pohano cherez te, shcho stalosya.)
*MÄƒ simt foarte rÄƒu din cauza celor Ã®ntÃ¢mplate.*

**"Ğ¯ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹/Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ² ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ñ–."** (Ya rozcharovanyy/rozcharovana v sobi.)
*Sunt dezamÄƒgit/Äƒ de mine.*

## Expresii pentru ÃmpÄƒcare

### IniÈ›ierea Dialogului

**"ĞœĞ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğµ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑ?"** (Mozhemo pohovoryty pro te, shcho stalosya?)
*Putem vorbi despre ce s-a Ã®ntÃ¢mplat?*

**"Ğ¯ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‡Ñƒ, Ñ‰Ğ¾Ğ± Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ»ÑĞ³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑĞ¿Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ²Ğ°Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ñ–."** (Ya ne khochu, shchob my lyahaly spaty posvareni.)
*Nu vreau sÄƒ ne culcÄƒm certaÈ›i.*

**"ĞœĞµĞ½Ñ– Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑƒÑ”. Ğ‘Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑƒÑ” Ğ½Ğ°Ñ."** (Meni tebe brakuye. Brakuye nas.)
*Ãmi lipseÈ™ti. Ne lipseÈ™te "noi".*

### DeclaraÈ›ii de Dragoste

**"Ğ¯ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ñ, Ñ– Ñ†Ğµ Ğ½Ñ–ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ·Ğ¼Ñ–Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ."** (Ya tebe kokhayu, i tse nikoly ne zminyt'sya.)
*Te iubesc, È™i asta nu se va schimba niciodatÄƒ.*

**"Ğ¢Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ–ÑˆĞ° Ğ»ÑĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ”Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñ‚Ñ–."** (Ty nayvazhlyyvisha lyudyna v moyemu zhytti.)
*EÈ™ti persoana cea mai importantÄƒ din viaÈ›a mea.*

**"ĞĞ°ÑˆĞµ ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ ÑĞ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ–ÑˆĞµ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑŒ-ÑĞºÑƒ ÑĞ²Ğ°Ñ€ĞºÑƒ."** (Nashe kokhannya syl'nishe za bud'-yaku svarku.)
*Iubirea noastrÄƒ e mai puternicÄƒ decÃ¢t orice ceartÄƒ.*

### Reconstruirea Conexiunii

**"ĞœĞ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ–Ğ¹Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸?"** (Mozhna tebe obiynyaty?)
*Pot sÄƒ te Ã®mbrÄƒÈ›iÈ™ez?*

**"Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾ ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ‚ĞºÑƒ."** (Davay pochnemo spochatku.)
*SÄƒ o luÄƒm de la capÄƒt.*

**"Ğ©Ğ¾ Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ñƒ Ğ·Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸, Ñ‰Ğ¾Ğ± Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸?"** (Shcho ya mozhu zrobyty, shchob vse vypravyty?)
*Ce pot face sÄƒ repar totul?*

**"Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑŒ, ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ."** (Davay pomyrymos', kokhannya.)
*SÄƒ ne Ã®mpÄƒcÄƒm, dragule/draga.*

## Acceptarea Scuzelor

**"Ğ¯ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ."** (Ya tebe probachayu.)
*Te iert.*

**"Ğ”ÑĞºÑƒÑ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ²ÑÑ/Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ."** (Dyakuyu, shcho vybachyvsya/vybachylasya.)
*MulÈ›umesc cÄƒ È›i-ai cerut scuze.*

**"Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¹ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ Ñ†Ğµ Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ."** (Davay zalyshymo tse v mynulomu.)
*SÄƒ lÄƒsÄƒm asta Ã®n trecut.*

## Gesturi de Reconciliere

### Ospitalitatea
GÄƒtitul Ã®mpreunÄƒ sau o masÄƒ tradiÈ›ionalÄƒ ucraineanÄƒ (borÈ™, varenyky) poate fi perfectÄƒ pentru reconciliere.

### Florile
Florile sunt Ã®ntotdeauna apreciate - un numÄƒr impar, ca È™i Ã®n Rusia.

### Timpul ÃmpreunÄƒ
O plimbare, o searÄƒ liniÈ™titÄƒ acasÄƒ, sau vizitarea locurilor speciale pentru voi.

### RezilienÈ›a
Ucrainenii apreciazÄƒ partenerii care nu renunÈ›Äƒ uÈ™or. AratÄƒ cÄƒ eÈ™ti acolo pentru bine È™i pentru rÄƒu.

## Expresii de Evitat

- **"Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡, ÑĞºÑ‰Ğ¾ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ²"** - "DacÄƒ" minimizeazÄƒ scuza
- **"Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡, Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ..."** - JustificÄƒrile anuleazÄƒ scuza
- **"ĞÑƒ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğµ, Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‡"** - Prea superficial

## Sfaturi Practice

1. **Fii sincer/Äƒ** - Ucrainenii preÈ›uiesc autenticitatea
2. **AratÄƒ loialitate** - DemonstreazÄƒ cÄƒ eÈ™ti acolo pe termen lung
3. **Gesturile conteazÄƒ** - MÃ¢ncare, flori, atenÈ›ie
4. **RespectÄƒ tradiÈ›iile** - Mai ales Ã®n prezenÈ›a familiei
5. **Fii rezistent/Äƒ** - Nu renunÈ›a la primul obstacol

## Concluzie

Reconcilierea Ã®n ucraineanÄƒ necesitÄƒ sinceritate, loialitate È™i cÄƒldurÄƒ. Cu aceste expresii È™i o atitudine de devotament, vei putea transforma orice conflict Ã®ntr-o oportunitate de a demonstra profunzimea angajamentului tÄƒu Ã®n relaÈ›ie.

**Ğ—Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ:** ĞĞµĞ¼Ğ°Ñ” Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ñ”Ğ½Ğ½Ñ

### "Î•Î¯Î½Î±Î¹ Î±Ï€Î»Î¬ Ï†Î¯Î»Î¿Ï‚/Ï†Î¯Î»Î·" (EÃ­nai aplÃ¡ fÃ­los/fÃ­li)
**Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°:** Ğ†Ğ½Ğµ Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ° Ñ„Ñ–Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ/Ñ„Ñ–Ğ»Ñ–

### "Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Î¿ Î¼ÏŒÎ½Î¿Ï‚/Î· Î¼ÏŒÎ½Î· Î³Î¹Î± Î¼Î­Î½Î±" (EÃ­sai o mÃ³nos/i mÃ³ni gia mÃ©na)
**Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°:** Ğ†ÑĞµ Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ/Ñ– Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ– Ñ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ°

**Ğ—Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ:** Ğ¢Ğ¸ â€” Ñ”Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹/Ñ”Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğµ

## ĞĞ±Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ

### "ÎœÏ€Î¿ÏÎ¿ÏÎ¼Îµ Î½Î± Ï„Î¿ ÏƒÏ…Î¶Î·Ï„Î®ÏƒÎ¿Ï…Î¼Îµ;" (BoroÃºme na to sizitÃ­soume?)
**Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°:** Ğ‘Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼e Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑÑ–Ğ·Ñ–Ñ‚Ñ–ÑÑƒĞ¼Ğµ?

**Ğ—Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ:** Ğ§Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ†Ğµ?

### "Î”Î¿Ï…Î»ÎµÏÏ‰ Ï€Î¬Î½Ï‰ ÏƒÏ„Î· Î¶Î®Î»Î¹Î± Î¼Î¿Ï…" (DoulÃ©vo pÃ¡no sti zÃ­lia mou)
**Ğ’Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°:** Ğ”ÑƒĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ñ– Ğ·Ñ–Ğ»Ñ–Ğ° Ğ¼Ñƒ

**Ğ—Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ:** Ğ¯ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†ÑÑ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ñ—Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ñ€ĞµĞ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸

## ĞšÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ñ– Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸

**ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒ:** Ğ“Ñ€ĞµĞºĞ¸ ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ†Ñ–Ğ¹Ğ½Ñ– Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´ĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñ–.

articles.title: Spaanse Sms-Taal voor Stellen: Van TQ tot BS
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Spaanse sms-taal is creatief, expressief en vol afkortingen. Als je met je Spaanstalige partner chat, wil je deze kennen! Van "TQ" tot "BS" - hier zijn alle essentials.

## Romantische Afkortingen

<PhraseOfDay
  word="TQ / TQM"
  translation="Te Quiero / Te Quiero Mucho"
  pronunciation="tee-kie / tee-kie-em"
  context="De meest gebruikte romantische afkorting in het Spaans."
/>

### Liefdesverklaringen

<VocabCard
  word="TQ"
  translation="Te Quiero - Ik hou van je"
  pronunciation="tee-kie"
  example="Buenas noches, TQ! (Welterusten, ik hou van je!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="TQM"
  translation="Te Quiero Mucho - Ik hou heel veel van je"
  pronunciation="tee-kie-em"
  example="Nos vemos manana, TQM! ğŸ’•"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="TA"
  translation="Te Amo - Ik hou (heel veel) van je"
  pronunciation="tee-a"
  example="TA con toda mi alma. ğŸ’•"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="TQMX"
  translation="Te Quiero Mucho por Siempre - Ik hou voor altijd veel van je"
  pronunciation="tee-kie-em-eks"
  example="TQMX, nunca lo olvides."
/>

<CultureTip title="TQ Overal" flag="ğŸ’•">
"TQ" is ZO populair in Spaanstalige landen dat je het overal ziet - berichten, social media, zelfs graffiti! Het is de standaard manier om "ik hou van je" te typen.
</CultureTip>

## Kusjes en Knuffels

<VocabCard
  word="BS / BSS"
  translation="Besos - Kusjes"
  pronunciation="bee-es"
  example="Hasta luego, bss! (Tot later, kusjes!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="1B"
  translation="Un Beso - Een kus"
  pronunciation="oen-bee"
  example="Buenas noches, 1B!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="MBS"
  translation="Muchos Besos - Veel kusjes"
  pronunciation="em-bee-es"
  example="Te extrano, MBS ğŸ’‹"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="BSTS"
  translation="Besitos - Kusjes (verkleind)"
  pronunciation="be-sie-tos"
  example="Duerme bien, bsts!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="ABZ"
  translation="Abrazos - Knuffels"
  pronunciation="a-bee-see"
  example="Muchos abz! ğŸ¤—"
/>

### Combinaties

| Afkorting | Betekenis |
|-----------|-----------|
| TQ + BS | Te quiero + besos |
| MBS + ABZ | Muchos besos + abrazos |
| TQM BB | Te quiero mucho bebe |

## Begroetingen en Afscheid

<VocabCard
  word="Hla / Ola"
  translation="Hola - Hoi"
  pronunciation="oo-la"
  example="Hla guapa! Â¿Que tal?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="BN"
  translation="Buenos/Buenas - Goedendag"
  pronunciation="bee-en"
  example="Bn! Â¿Como amaneciste?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="HL"
  translation="Hasta Luego - Tot later"
  pronunciation="a-tsjee-el"
  example="Me voy, HL! TQ!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ns vms"
  translation="Nos Vemos - Tot ziens"
  pronunciation="nos-vee-mos"
  example="Ns vms en una hora!"
/>

## Dagelijkse Communicatie

<VocabCard
  word="Q tl?"
  translation="Â¿Que tal? - Hoe gaat het?"
  pronunciation="kee-tal"
  example="Hla bb, q tl?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Q hcs?"
  translation="Â¿Que haces? - Wat doe je?"
  pronunciation="kee-a-ses"
  example="Q hcs ahora?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Dnd stas?"
  translation="Â¿Donde estas? - Waar ben je?"
  pronunciation="don-de-es-tas"
  example="Oye, dnd stas? Te espero."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Kmo?"
  translation="Â¿Como? - Hoe/Wat?"
  pronunciation="ko-moo"
  example="Kmo? No entendi."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Pq?"
  translation="Â¿Por que? - Waarom?"
  pronunciation="por-kee"
  example="Pq no vienes?"
/>

<CultureTip title="Q = Que" flag="ğŸ“±">
De letter "Q" vervangt bijna altijd "Que" in Spaanse sms-taal. "Q" klinkt hetzelfde als "que" wanneer je het uitspreekt!
</CultureTip>

## Gemis en Verlangen

<VocabCard
  word="TE"
  translation="Te Extrano - Ik mis je"
  pronunciation="tee-ee"
  example="Llevo todo el dia pensando en ti. TE ğŸ’•"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="TEM"
  translation="Te Extrano Mucho - Ik mis je heel erg"
  pronunciation="tee-ee-em"
  example="Cuando vuelves? TEM!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="QVA?"
  translation="Â¿Cuando Vienes Aqui? - Wanneer kom je?"
  pronunciation="kwan-do-vie-nes"
  example="TEM! QVA?"
/>

## Reacties en Emoties

<VocabCard
  word="Jaja / Jeje"
  translation="Haha (lachen)"
  pronunciation="cha-cha / chee-chee"
  example="Jajaja eres muy gracioso ğŸ˜‚"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="KK"
  translation="Caca (milde vloek/frustratie)"
  pronunciation="ka-ka"
  example="Tengo que trabajar manana, kk ğŸ˜"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="OMG"
  translation="Oh My God (ook in Spaans gebruikt)"
  pronunciation="oo-em-djie"
  example="OMG no me lo creo!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="XD"
  translation="Lachend gezicht"
  pronunciation="eks-de"
  example="Que tonto eres XD"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ntk"
  translation="No Te Kejes - Klaag niet"
  pronunciation="no-tee-kee-ches"
  example="Ntk, que tu tampoco trabajas!"
/>

<CultureTip title="Jajaja" flag="ğŸ˜‚">
Spanjaarden lachen met "jajaja" (uitgesproken als cha-cha-cha), niet met "hahaha"! De J klinkt als een zachte g/ch in het Spaans.
</CultureTip>

## Plannen Maken

<VocabCard
  word="Kdms?"
  translation="Â¿Quedamos? - Spreken we af?"
  pronunciation="ke-da-mos"
  example="Kdms esta noche?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Vns?"
  translation="Â¿Vienes? - Kom je?"
  pronunciation="vie-nes"
  example="Estoy en el bar, vns?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="AK"
  translation="Aqui - Hier"
  pronunciation="a-kie"
  example="Ya estoy ak. Dnd stas?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Dps"
  translation="Despues - Later"
  pronunciation="des-pwes"
  example="Ahora no puedo, dps te llamo."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Xa"
  translation="Para - Voor"
  pronunciation="pa-ra"
  example="Esto es xa ti. ğŸ’"
/>

## Spaanse Lettersubstituties

| Letter | Vervangt | Voorbeeld |
|--------|----------|-----------|
| K | Que/Ca | Kiero = Quiero |
| Q | Que | Q tal = Que tal |
| X | Por/Para | Xq = Por que |
| D | De | Dnd = Donde |
| TB/TM | Tambien | Yo tb = Yo tambien |
| + | Mas | Te quiero + = mucho mas |

## Romantische Berichten

### Goedemorgen Bericht
```
Bn dias mi amor! ğŸŒ
Q tl dormiste?
TQM, ns vms luego!
Bss ğŸ’•
```

### Tijdens het Werk
```
Q hcs bb?
Estoy en el trabajo pensando en ti
TEM! ğŸ’•
Kdms x la noche?
```

### Goedenacht Bericht
```
Bn noches cielo ğŸŒ™
Gracias x un dia genial
TQM con todo mi corazon
Suena conmigo
Bss! ğŸ’•
```

## Koosnaampjes in Berichten

| Afkorting | Betekenis |
|-----------|-----------|
| BB | Bebe - Schatje |
| MI | Mi amor - Mijn liefde |
| Cri | Carino - Lieverd |
| Grdto/a | Gordito/a - Schatje |
| Peke | Pequeno/a - Kleintje |

<VocabCard
  word="Hla bb"
  translation="Hola bebe - Hoi schatje"
  pronunciation="oo-la bee-bee"
  example="Hla bb, TQ! Dnd stas?"
/>

## Veelgebruikte Uitdrukkingen

<VocabCard
  word="NTC"
  translation="No Te Creas - Geloof het niet/Grapje"
  pronunciation="no-tee-kree-as"
  example="Me caso manana. NTC! ğŸ˜‚"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="TVL"
  translation="Te Veo Luego - Tot later"
  pronunciation="tee-vee-el"
  example="Me voy, TVL! BS!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="TMB"
  translation="Tambien - Ook"
  pronunciation="tam-bien"
  example="- TQ! - Yo tmb! ğŸ’•"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="NPH"
  translation="No Puedo Hablar - Ik kan niet praten"
  pronunciation="no-pwee-doo-ab-lar"
  example="Estoy en reunion, NPH. Dps te llamo."
/>

## Emoji's en Combinaties

Populaire emoji-combinaties in Spaanse berichten:

| Combinatie | Gebruik |
|------------|---------|
| TQ + ğŸ’•â¤ï¸ | Liefde |
| ğŸ˜˜ + BS | Kusjes |
| ğŸ¥° + BB | Schatje |
| ğŸ˜‚ + jaja | Lachen |
| ğŸ”¥ | Heet/Aantrekkelijk |
| ğŸ’‹ | Kussen |

## Tips voor Spaans Chatten

1. **Gebruik Q veel** - Het is de meest voorkomende afkorting
2. **Vergeet de accenten** - In sms-taal slaat iedereen ze over
3. **Jajaja voor lachen** - Niet hahaha
4. **TQ is essentieel** - Gebruik het vaak!
5. **Wees expressief** - Emoji's horen erbij

## Snelle Referentiekaart

| Situatie | Afkortingen |
|----------|-------------|
| Liefde uitdrukken | TQ, TQM, TA, BS |
| Begroeten | Hla, Bn, Q tl? |
| Afscheid | HL, TVL, Ns vms |
| Gemis | TE, TEM |
| Plannen | Kdms?, Vns?, Dps |
| Lachen | Jaja, XD |

<CTA
  text="Klaar om te chatten met je Spaanse liefde?"
  buttonText="Begin Samen te Leren"
/>
